attributes.action: 17 Billion spent on HR2 would be better spent on Truck Roads and Cycle only lanes
attributes.additional_details:
Truck Roads have been neglected for 30 years 14 billion sent on Duelling Truck Roads would help our economy better than 17 billion on London to Birmingham HR2. 3 billion spent on cycle only lanes
will save a lot of lives.a change of plan will reduce employment quicker in the regions that need jobs more than South East.Making our roads and cycle paths safer will save lives,
